scripts.build: npm run copymanifest && browserify -e src/index.ts -p tsify -o ../../dist/%npm_package_dapplets_name%/%npm_package_version%/index.js
scripts.watch: npm run copymanifest && watchify -v -e src/index.ts -p tsify -o ../../dist/%npm_package_dapplets_name%/%npm_package_version%/index.js
scripts.clean: (if exist lib rd /q /s lib) & (if exist dist rd /q /s dist)
